title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees, with a total of 8 data points.
Overall Number of employees has increased over the Year.
Number of employees is roughly constant from 2011 to 2014, gradually increasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2016, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Max Number of employees about 76032.0 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Number of employees about 29400.0 was recorded at Year 2011
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees, with a total of 8 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2011 to 2016.
Also, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2017 to 2018.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2017.
